response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations, offering unparalleled value and benefits. Given its exceptional quality and the impact it can have on your endeavors, we believe its true worth is $1,200,000. However, to make this opportunity more accessible, I am offering you the chance to secure this product at a special introductory price of $1,150,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant savings compared to its market value. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you require any additional information to make your decision.", "product_price": 1150000}
